snippet.title: Edge of Sanity - Announcement Trailer - Future Games Show Gamescom 2022
snippet.description: Edge of Sanity, a sinister survival game involving a terrifying descent into the dark, was revealed at the Future Games Show at Gamescom 2022. Edge of Sanity is coming soon.
